content.text:
# Bohman & Schwartz

Bohman & Schwartz was an automobile coachbuilder in Pasadena, California. It was established after the collapse of the Walter M Murphy Company by some of Murphy's former employees.
Gallery
File:1932 Duesenberg J Bohman & Schwartz Convertible Coupe (3828660943).jpg|Bohman & Schwartz body on a 1932 Duesenberg J chassis
File:1937 Duesenberg J Bohman & Schwartz Landaulet - rvr (4610301107).jpg|1937 Duesenberg J Laundalet bodied by Bohman & Schwartz
File:1938 Phantom Corsair Pebble Beach Concours dElegance 2007 01.jpg|Maurice Schwartz of Bohman & Schwartz helped bring the initial drawings of the Phantom Corsair to reality, and subsequently built it.
File:1938 Phantom Corsair Pebble Beach Concours dElegance 2007 03.jpg|1938 Phantom Corsair rear
